thread.title: BlackBerry introduces new Privacy Shade app for Android
thread.title_full: BlackBerry introduces new Privacy Shade app for Android

author: Bla1ze
title: BlackBerry introduces new Privacy Shade app for Android
text:
BlackBerry has now introduced a new Android app called Privacy Shade. It's an interesting little app that allows you to selectively choose to obscure anything that is displayed on your screen so that others can't look at it.

Along with the bevy of app updates to the BlackBerry Hub+ Suite , BlackBerry has now also introduced a new Android app called Privacy Shade. It's an interesting little app that allows you to selectively choose to obscure anything that is displayed on your screen so that others can't look at it.
